949 UC Berkeley currently looks like a war zone. 

An ANTIFA member just lit off a flare resulting in TPUSA event attendees being rushed inside. posted 2 days ago by I-am-Orlando PRO 81 comments award share report block FRONTLINES TPUSA @FrontlinesTPUSA • 2d UC Berkeley currently looks like a war zone. An ANTIFA member just lit off a flare resulting in TPUSA event attendees being rushed inside. A car then comes and starts backfiring visibly scaring multiple attendees who feared they were hearing gunshots. @TPUSA | @Savsays

You map them out. You document their entire social network, their funding. You watch everything they do and collect evidence that's admissible in court. When you finally move, you take them all down, particularly the leaders. It takes time. This is how they do anti-racketeering work, anti-mafia, anti-gang, anti-cartel ... etc. Every time you see the FBI bragging about busting 30 men running a human trafficking and prostitution ring, this is how they do it. It's months to years' worth of work to get these creeps. Let Trump work.
